name: Chaos Inquisitor
description: A fanatic enlightened to the grace of Chaos
story: Following an argument with the Chaos Sect Axe, he left the Chaos Sect only to be captured soon after by the Rose Apostles. During a narrow escape, he became filled with a desperate fear of death and was awakened to the existence of Chaos.

relations.description: Chaos Inquisitor deeply respects the infinite faith he has in Chaos.
Only a coward attacks people from behind, but with skills like that, he may have potential.
Chaos Inquisitor is inspired by Corvus's sincere faith, but regrets that it is directed towards a being so undeserving.
Chaos Inquisitor hopes he never has to encounter her again.

specialty.name: Unshaken Faith
specialty.description: His faith in Chaos is resolute.

type.name: Unknown Knowledge
type.description: It's not easy to understand knowledge from another world.

skills.name: Preach
skills.description: Attacks the enemy in the name of Chaos. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's lost Health. Recovers Health proportional to damage dealt.
skills.enhanced_description: Attacks the enemy in the name of Chaos, with a {{variable}} chance to activate Heavy Strike when the enemy is buffed. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's lost Health. Recovers Health proportional to damage dealt.

localize.name: カオス教団 執行追跡者

skill1.name: 強撃
skill1.desc: 敵単体に攻撃し、それぞれ35.0%の確率で2つの強化効果を解除する。

skill2.name: 解体部隊の武装
skill2.desc: 1回に受けるダメージが最大生命力の50.0%を超えない。

skill3.name: 説法
skill3.desc: 敵単体に攻撃する。自身の生命力が低いほどダメージがUPし、与えたダメージに応じて自身の生命力を回復する。
skill3.soul_description: 敵単体に攻撃する。自身の生命力が低いほどダメージがUPし、与えたダメージに応じて自身の生命力を回復する。
